item.title: 亚马逊在迈阿密温伍德地区的新大厦租用办公空间
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）在签署了迈阿密温伍德（Wynwood）地区有史以来最大的写字楼租约后，将进驻该地区。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. is moving into Miami’s Wynwood neighborhood after signing the district’s largest-ever office lease.】

item.title: 美国钢铁公司首席执行官激进分子人选：如获高位，将持有主要股份
item.description: 钢铁行业资深人士 Alan Kestenbaum 表示，如果美国钢铁公司放弃与新日本制铁公司合并，并且他被选为该公司的首席执行官，他愿意以个人名义对该公司进行大量投资。【原文：Steel industry veteran Alan Kestenbaum said he’s willing to make a significant personal investment in United States Steel Corp. if it abandons a merger with Nippon Steel Corp. and he’s selected to become its chief executive.】

item.title: 俄亥俄州繁荣小镇求助慕尼黑政府 10 亿美元改造机场
item.description: 俄亥俄州哥伦布市正处于发展的关键时刻。但是，随着越来越多的企业和居民因生活成本更低廉而涌入该州首府，其老化的机场也感受到了压力。【原文：Columbus, Ohio, is having a moment. But, as more businesses and residents flock to the state capital for its cheaper cost of living, its aging airports are feeling the strain.】

item.title: 杠杆赌注暴跌，英伟达-ETF组合面临关键时刻
item.description: 去年，日间交易员们将数十亿美元投入杠杆化的英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.ETF 基金，以期在这只全球最炙手可热的股票上获得更多收益。现在，这些赌注岌岌可危。【原文：Day traders spent last year shoving billions of dollars into leveraged Nvidia Corp. ETFs in a bid to amp up their gains on the hottest stock on the planet. Now those wagers are in peril.】

item.title: 澳大利亚通胀可能决定澳大利亚央行降息和大选时机
item.description: 澳大利亚本周的季度通胀数据可能是储备银行最终是否很快开始货币宽松周期的关键，进而有助于决定 5 月 17 日大选的时间。【原文：Australia’s quarterly inflation data this week may be key to whether the Reserve Bank finally embarks on a monetary easing cycle soon, and in turn, help decide the timing of an election due by May 17.】

item.title: 为什么橡树的霍华德-马克斯（Howard Marks）要警惕市场泡沫？
item.description:
大型科技公司估值偏低，与互联网泡沫相似。【原文：

Lofty valuations in big tech and parallels with the dotcom crash.

】

item.title: Emerson 以 170 亿美元估值收购 AspenTech 其余股份
item.description: 艾默生电气公司（Emerson Electric Co.）同意收购其尚未持有的 Aspen Technology 其余股份，该交易对这家工业软件公司的估值为完全稀释后的市值 170 亿美元。【原文：Emerson Electric Co. agreed to buy the rest of Aspen Technology that it doesn’t already own in a deal that values the industrial-software company at a fully diluted market value of $17 billion.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克的人工智能赌注带来 60 亿美元甜头，X 公司的债务也随之而来
item.description: 华尔街的银行终于可以卸下与 X 有关的债务了，它们为潜在买家提供了一个甜头：要求获得该社交媒体平台在埃隆-马斯克的人工智能企业中的股份。【原文：Wall Street banks, finally within striking distance of offloading debt tied to X, have a sweetener on offer for potential buyers: a claim on the social-media platform’s stake in Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence venture.】

item.title: 特朗普获胜后，美国人削减了对联邦福利的期望值
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行的一项最新调查显示，唐纳德-特朗普当选总统后，美国人降低了对联邦政府提供福利的预期。【原文：Americans downgraded their expectations for benefits from the federal government after Donald Trump won the presidency, according to a new survey by the Federal Reserve Bank of New York.】

item.title: 俄罗斯油轮风暴后在法国附近掉头停航
item.description: 两艘从俄罗斯运输原油的油轮在驶过法国时掉头，目前停在北部瑟堡港附近。【原文：Two oil tankers hauling crude from Russia made U-turns as they sailed past France and are now at a standstill near the northern port of Cherbourg.】

item.title: 卡尼称若美国发动贸易战，加拿大可利用电力作为筹码
item.description: 正在竞选加拿大领导人的前央行行长马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）说，如果加拿大政府需要对特朗普政府的关税进行报复，它应该对限制向美国出口电力持开放态度。【原文：Mark Carney, the former central banker who’s running to lead Canada, said the government should be open to curbing electricity exports to the US if it needs to retaliate against tariffs from the Trump administration.】

item.title: 爱尔兰希望通过出售 5%的股份进一步削减 AIB 集团的股份
item.description: 爱尔兰政府正在出让 AIB Group Plc 大约 5%的股份，这是该银行私有化的最新一步。【原文：The Irish government is offering a roughly 5% stake in AIB Group Plc, the latest step toward the privatization of the lender.】

item.title: 石油交易商预计欧佩克+下周将坚持供应计划
item.description: 石油交易商预计，欧佩克+将在下周的审查会议上坚持目前的供应政策，抵制美国总统唐纳德-特朗普要求打开水龙头、降低原油价格的压力。【原文：Oil traders expect OPEC+ to stick with its current supply policy at a review meeting next week, resisting pressure from US President Donald Trump to open the taps and bring down crude prices.】

item.title: 看涨科技股的交易员在股市暴跌前进行了创纪录的错误 ETF 投注
item.description: 交易所交易基金投资者上周在美国科技领域下了创纪录的赌注，但周一他们的赌注又被压了下去，因为对一家中国初创公司的人工智能模式带来的竞争的焦虑正在重创科技股。【原文：Exchange-traded fund investors who placed record bets on the US technology space last week are getting crushed Monday as anxiety over competition from a Chinese startup’s AI model is hitting tech stocks hard.】

item.title: DeepSeek 的风险让那些坚持大科技公司主导地位的投资者感到痛苦
item.description: 在本季度最繁忙的财报周之一来临之前，既定的市场叙事突然被颠覆，投资者情绪和定位捉襟见肘，你会得到什么？约一万亿美元的市值被抹去。【原文：What do you get when an established market narrative is suddenly flipped upside down, with stretched investor sentiment and positioning, right before one of the busiest earnings weeks of the season? About a trillion dollars of market value erased.】

item.title: 微型科技股抓住 DeepSeek 模式后大涨
item.description: 两只小型科技股宣布计划在其业务中使用 DeepSeek 的大型语言模型，这两只股票周一逆市大涨。【原文：Two small technology stocks are surging Monday, bucking the broader market’s selloff, after announcing plans to use DeepSeek’s large language model in their businesses.】

item.title: 关于 DeepSeek 大跌的 17 点思考
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 从波哥大到北极，特朗普看到了经济强国的力量
item.description: 从南美到北极，全世界都在接受特朗普理论的速成培训。【原文：From South America to the Arctic, the world is getting a crash course in the Trump doctrine.】

item.title: 谷歌风投支持的生物技术公司 Metsera 寻求首次公开募股 2.92 亿美元
item.description: Metsera Inc. 正寻求在首次公开募股中筹集 2.92 亿美元，加入了众多即将首次公开募股的医疗保健公司的行列。【原文：Metsera Inc. is seeking to raise $292 million in an initial public offering, joining a clutch of health-care firms set to make their debuts as public companies.】

item.title: 上周买入 VIX 看涨期权的交易者可免受大跌影响
item.description: 周一全球科技股大跌，仅英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：Traders who picked up cheap VIX call options last week are getting some protection from Monday’s global tech selloff that erased more than $400 billion in market value from Nvidia Corp. alone.】

item.title: DeepSeek 担忧冲击华尔街，科技股暴跌
item.description: DeepSeek 人工智能移动应用程序上的欢迎词。摄影师：安德烈-鲁达科夫/布鲁姆伯格【原文：A welcome message on the DeepSeek artificial intelligence mobile app. Photographer: Andrey Rudakov/Bloomberg】

item.title: 调查人员要求 Edison 保存洛杉矶伊顿大火中的装备
item.description: 火灾调查人员已要求南加州爱迪生公司（Southern California Edison Co.【原文：Fire investigators have asked Southern California Edison Co. to preserve its equipment near the site where the deadly Eaton fire began earlier this month.】

item.title: 2024 年底美国新房销售跃升，第二次实现年度增长
item.description: 由于客户利用建筑商提供的优惠政策，美国新房的销售量在 2024 年 12 月达到了高点，从而导致购买量连续第二年增长。【原文：Sales of new US homes ended 2024 on a high note in December as customers took advantage of incentives from builders, leading to a second straight year of increased purchases.】

item.title: 拉脱维亚总理所属政党支持卡扎克出任央行行长： LSM
item.description: 据拉脱维亚公共广播公司（LSM）报道，拉脱维亚总理埃维卡-西利纳（Evika Silina）领导的新团结党将提名马丁斯-卡扎克（Martins Kazaks）连任央行行长，因为三党联盟未能找到接替他的人选，但该公司并未说明从何处获得这一消息。【原文：Latvian Prime Minister Evika Silina’s New Unity party will nominate Martins Kazaks for a second term as central bank governor after the three-party coalition failed to find a candidate to replace him, public broadcaster LSM reported without saying where it got the information.】

item.title: 中国人工智能初创企业颠覆股市，科技巨头接受现实检验
item.description: 中国初创公司 DeepSeek 动摇了只有少数拥有巨额预算的公司才能在人工智能领域竞争的信念，并有可能挑战那些以高额估值回报最大参与者的投资案例。【原文：Chinese startup DeepSeek has shaken the belief that only a few firms with huge budgets can compete in the artificial intelligence field — potentially challenging an investment case that rewarded the biggest players with rich valuations.】

item.title: 俄罗斯石油制裁意味着中东原油多年来最坚挺
item.description: 抢购被制裁的俄罗斯石油的替代货物，已将中东原油价格推高至与全球基准价格相比的异常溢价。【原文：The rush to buy replacement cargoes for sanctioned Russian oil has pushed Middle Eastern crude prices to an unusual premium to the global benchmark.】

item.title: 纽约市废除出租车保险条例修订版中的 "有偿付能力 "要求
item.description: 优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc. ）警告说，这项规定可能会导致数千名司机没有保险，纽约市正在收回一项规则修改提案，该提案要求出租车和共享出行司机必须由一家 "有偿付能力且负责任的 "保险公司承保。【原文：New York City is walking back a proposed rule change that would have required taxi and rideshare drivers to be covered by a “solvent and responsible” insurance carrier, after Uber Technologies Inc. warned the mandate risked leaving thousands of drivers uninsured.】

item.title: 莫桑比克在骚乱中降低关键利率和储备金要求
item.description: 莫桑比克央行延长了自2017年以来最长的宽松周期，并降低了商业贷款人需要存入央行的准备金比例，以帮助提振因选举后动荡而受到冲击的经济。【原文：Mozambique’s central bank extended its longest easing cycle since 2017 and reduced the ratio of reserves that commercial lenders need to deposit with it, to help boost its economy that’s been shaken by post-election unrest.】

item.title: 交易员称 DeepSeek 对美国高价科技股构成真正威胁
item.description: 中国 DeepSeek 的到来正在引发投资者对美国科技股是否配得上其高估值的担忧。【原文：The arrival of China’s DeepSeek is fanning concerns among investors over whether US tech stocks deserve their rich valuations.】

item.title: 阿布扎比鹰山公司计划投资 60 亿美元建设格鲁吉亚项目，以推动全球发展
item.description: 总部位于阿布扎比的开发商 Eagle Hills Properties LLC 正深化其国际业务，计划斥资 60 亿美元在格鲁吉亚建设项目。【原文：Abu Dhabi-based developer Eagle Hills Properties LLC is deepening its international foray with a $6 billion plan to build projects in Georgia.】
